data.title: Men's Graphic T-Shirt Endelave Eco-Friendly Limited Edition Short Sleeve Tee-Shirt Vintage Birthday Gift Novelty
data.meta_description: COMFORTABLE CASUAL WEAR ★ 100% semi-combed Ringspun cotton pleasant to wear. Reinforcing tape on neck. Elastane rib collar. Machine washable.ORIGINAL ULTRABASIC BRAND ★ Independent Graphics brand connecting artists with those who love original artworks and top-quality organic cotton clothing.ECO-FRIENDLY AND ETHICAL CL
data.text:
Received exactly what I ordered in a extremely timely manner, especially considering that it shipped from France! Very happy with my purchase and Ultrabasic's service!! Thank you!

Just as described! Great quality of a shirt. Fit just right. Material is comfortable.

In retailer shirts & dresses the petites usually fit me better, i'm short, but this regular fit well. looks super cute, i've gotten so many compliments on it. comfortable material.

I just got this in the mail the other day. i was really excited and then crushed. too bad but not what i wanted. will keep it anyway, it can be used
